website_summaries.verdict: A rugged boat lighting option that features a super low profile and is available in a variety of colors.
pros: Made from 316 marine-grade stainless steel, with a shatterproof lens
Has a low profile and footprint
Solid construction and easy to install
cons: Cannot be used or mounted out of the water
Does not come with a rocker switch or remote

customer_reviews.title: We used 2
customer_reviews.text: Put 2 on the back of our wake boat very bright and very well built.
customer_reviews.author: richard benson

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Bright
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was nice, and lights appear to be of high quality. Put 3 of these on a boat with 12 foot beam and a 5 foot deep swim platform. As picture indicates, illuminates the area well beyond the swim platform. So far, very happy with this purchase. Only con was that prior to purchase, I couldn't get any answers about how many amps each light takes, so that was a little frustrating. Pamphlet that came with these says 2.8 amp draw @ 13 volts..
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Well they worked well for about 6 months then 1 color at a time started failing now a year later they are dead, all 6 of them now I have to haul the boat to remove them. If you think you are saving money think again it's $1000 just to pull my boat out of the water not worth it at all. Most underwater lights last for at least 3 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: SailTSB

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction and very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Appears very good quality, solidly built and very bright. I mounted two blue to my transom and very happy with the light output. Time will tell on their ability to remain water tight. See photos in lake water.
customer_reviews.author: Scott 😀

customer_reviews.title: Cant use them out of water
customer_reviews.text: Fine print says you can't run these above water. So you cannot use them when your underway. I returned them. Way to much money to not be able to use them all the time. They seem very well built, very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: SUPER bright!!
customer_reviews.text: Put 3 of these on my twin engine boat. Works perfectly. Very impressed with quality and craftsmanship of these. They are heavy and well built, zero issues with installation and very VERY happy with the light quality
customer_reviews.author: Valued Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: ... pictures once they are installed so fare I’m very happy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tested them out of water they are very bright will up load pictures once they are installed so fare I’m very happy
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and power underwater lights. Easy to install and materials are better than the OEM parts offered by manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Cristian M.

customer_reviews.title: Use a lot of marine caulking
customer_reviews.text: Havnt had time to get it in the water yet but it was pretty simple to install / wire as long as you have some knowledge of wiring. The wire diagram kind of sucks. Lights up nice outside of water
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Short circuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair and both came with a short circuit and blowing all the fuse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and is working as advertised. So far we have only used them in cloudy water along the ICW on the east coast. We installed two lights on a trawler with a 15 ft beam and there is enough light to cover most of the transom. The test will be when we're in clear water to see if they light up behind the boat for the advertised distance. We also wired them to a single two way switch I'm thinking of separating the power so I can light both colors at once. Overall we're very satisfied with these lights and the price is more than competitive with the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Schea

customer_reviews.title: Great output! Especially in
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great! Originally I started with two outside of the outboards. The light was great but left a shadow between my outboards. I installed a third in the center and the outcome is great! I installed them with an On-Off-On rocker switch to best toggle between blue and white. The lights always get attention and we have received many complements.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing on my ‘06 Yamaha AR230. Haven’t had it in the water yet, but happy with the product so far. Bought a 3-way rocket switch to easily take advantage of the dual-color feature. Seems very bright and heavy duty. Hoping the silicone around the wires holds up well since I ran it close to the exhaust, we’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install , great product so far
customer_reviews.text: These lights were so easy to install , and requires a very small 1/4" hole to pull wire thru hull , seals up with marine grade caulking GREAT JOB JIAWILL !!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: Must be in the water at all times
customer_reviews.text: Read the small print! These lights must remain in the water at all times making them useless on the transom of a boat while underway......Great if your sitting at the dock but otherwise look further at other brands....
customer_reviews.author: that's rite

customer_reviews.title: I ordered for a friend who's re-, building his ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for a friend who's re-,building his boat .. And he hasn't installed them as yet..don't know if you should publish
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

product_meta.title: jiawill 60W CREE LED Surface Mount Underwater Boat Lights 316L Stainless Steel with Internal Driver and Overheat Protection 2853 Lumens
product_meta.description:
These LED underwater boat lights function as transom lights and are also great for dock lighting. Use this durable LED boat light to add color to your wake, attract fish, or for nighttime swimming and diving. 
The vibration- and shock-resistant underwater boat light has a 316 marine-grade stainless steel housing with a shatterproof poly-carbonate lens. 
This boat light uses 6 Cree LEDs to produce white illumination or 12 Cree LEDs for red, green, or blue illumination. 
The 60-watt underwater LED boat light operates within a wide 9-32V DC range. Installation hardware is included for surface-mounting on a variety of transom types


Voltage:9-32V DC
Lumens: 2853 lumens 
Material:Marine grade 316L stainless steel
Life time:50000H
Water Resistance:IP68
Mount Type:Surface
Total Wire Length:59in(150cm)
Diameter:94mm(3.7inch)
Depth:17mm(0.67inch)
feature_bullets: The vibration and shock resistant underwater boat light has a 316 marine grade stainless steel housing with a shatterproof polycarbonate lens.
This boat light uses 6 Cree 10watt LEDs to produce white illumination or 12 Cree LEDs for red, green, or blue illumination

Exclusive over temperature protection ensures the light can operate above without damage,no external driver within a wide 9-32V DC range,there are fewer connections and devices to fail and less equipment to mount
Super lower profile (17mm) and smaller footprint,diameter of light body is only 94mm
Installation hardware is included for surface-mounting on a variety of transom types, or install on your boat's trim tab with a mounting bracket (sold separately).
